channel.title: Posts on Matthew Laver
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Matthew Laver

item.title: Think! About Your Work
item.description: Part 2 in a series on “The Pragmatic Programmer”. Too often we do work on autopilot when really we should be thinking, actively and continuously. How do we start to do something that feels so fundamental?

item.title: Care About Your Craft
item.description: Part 1 in a series on “The Pragmatic Programmer”. Do you care for your craft? Have you lost your motivation? Lets see if we can learn from those who have gone before us
